H0.text: who invented the chip in . debit cards. Roland Moreno

H1.text: who invented the chip in . debit cards. Jacques Vallée

H2.text: who invented the chip in . debit cards. Marc Hedlund

H3.text: who invented the chip in . debit cards. Helmut Gröttrup

A4.text: Gröttrup invented the smart card as a 'forgery-proof key' for secure identification and access control (ID card) or storage of a secure key, also including inductive coupling for near-field communication (NFC).

A5.text: In February 1967, Gröttrup introduced the idea of incorporating an integrated circuit chip onto a plastic carrier and filed the patent DE1574074 in West Germany for a tamper-proof identification switch based on a semiconductor device.
